function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delays in upscaling production in chemical manufacturing companies","Impact":"Slowdown in predicted growth","Mitigation":"Implement remote working and automation in manufacturing processes","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and control systems, robotic process automation","People":"Employees, stakeholders, and investors","Owner":"Company management and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Closures of educational institutions due to COVID-19","Impact":"Socioeconomic implications, social mobility issues, and disparity in access to education","Mitigation":"Provide support for low-income families, invest in digital education infrastructure, and reduce school fees","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, digital education tools, and financial aid systems","People":"Students, families, and educators","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, and community organizations"}]}
